entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
